system.description:
This School of magic is concerned with magic itself; detecting and manipulating magic either directly or in the form of pure force. It allows the caster to manipulate magic, as well as create effects using that magic to act on objects or creatures in the form of invisible force. The Forms used to cast spells of this School must include firm gestures.

Spontaneous Casting Complexities

ComplexityEffect
0

Detect magical emanations; Inflict Health damage with force

1

Make an object or area radiate magic

2

Create a strong controlled force

3

Delay the effect of another spell

4

Extend the duration of another spell
